name: Transition Region (ka ≈ 1)
purpose: Verify behavior in transition region where ka ≈ 1

hornresp_parameters.notes: ka ≈ 1.0 at this frequency for 20 cm radius

expected_results.behavior: R and X are comparable in transition region

validation_targets.notes: Values are approximate - transition region has complex behavior

notes: At ka ≈ 1, neither mass nor resistance dominates
Both R and X are significant (~0.5-0.6)
Tests transition from mass-controlled to radiation-controlled
Hornresp configuration: Same as TC-P1-RAD-01 but different test frequency
